alert.note: Alert for Brown; Kewaunee; Manitowoc (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Brown, southwestern Kewaunee and northeastern Manitowoc Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 828 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bellevue Town to 6 miles northeast of Two Creeks. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. Gusty winds from the thunderstorms may precede the actual thunderstorms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Two Creeks around 835 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
